#summary Simple samples.

= C =

{{
MTag_File *file;
MTag_Tag *tag;

file = mtag_file_new ("song.mp3");

tag = mtag_file_tag (file);
printf (”%s - %s\n”, mtag_tag_get (tag, “artist”), mtag_tag_get (tag, “title”));

mtag_file_free (file);
}}

= Ruby =

{{{
file = MTag::File.new(fn)
print(”%s - %s\n” % [file.tag.artist, file.tag.title])
}}}
